name: perl-scalar-list-utils

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Scalar::Util - A selection of general-utility scalar subroutines

dependencies.name: perl

Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.description: Statistics::Basic - A collection of very basic statistics modules

dependent_to.description: Sub::Quote - Efficient generation of subroutines via string eval

dependent_to.name: perl-hash-merge
dependent_to.description: Hash::Merge merges two arbitrarily deep hashes into a single hash.

dependent_to.name: perl-moo
dependent_to.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)
